component.name: Catalyst
component.summary: A free and open source user and privacy focused web browser aiming to provide a simple and private browsing experience.

description.p: Catalyst is a simple, no fuss web browser. It browses the web, and does it well
A clean, minimal, and cohesive interface for a simple and easy browsing experience
Does not collect any user data and includes a built-in ad blocker
Open to feature suggestions to improve the overall experience
